          <title>
            <string language="sl">Nastavi xo in vo za tire planetov</string>
            <string language="en">Set Both xo and vo for Planetary Orbits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie xo und Vl für planetarische Bahnen 
ein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Placez le xo et la Vo pour des orbites 
planétaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajuste  o xo e o Vo para órbitas planetárias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regoli sia il xo che il Vo per le orbite 
planetarie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέστε και το xo και vo για τις πλανητικές τροχιές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fije el xo y el Vo para las órbitas planetarias</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz potencialne in kinetične energije planeta pri danem tiru planeta.</string>
            <string language="en">Potential and kinetic energy of a planet with a given orbit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tir planeta</string>
            <string language="en">planet's orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">potencialna energija</string>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">težnost</string>
            <string language="en">gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mögliche und kinetische Energie eines Planeten 
mit einer gegebenen Bahn.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie potentielle et cinétique d'une planète
avec une orbite donnée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia potencial e cinética de um planeta com 
uma órbita dada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia potenziale e cinetica di un pianeta con 
una data orbita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιθανή και κινητική ενέργεια ενός πλανήτη με μια 
δεδομένη τροχιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía potencial y cinética de un planeta con 
una órbita dada.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
